channel.title: It's been fun. It will always be.
channel.description:
With launch looming minutes away I just wanted to say it has been fun. Having been here for so long (I've lurked longer than you know) it's going to be a strange feeling post release. A measurable portion of my life has been following the media releases, reading dev blogs, lurking the forums, and more recently participating in the community. Waiting for bm has become a norm and it's going to be shattered in T-30 minutes.
It's been a blast waiting with all of you, and here's to another almost eight years of fun.

item.title: It's been fun. It will always be.
item.dc:creator: Pyroclase
item.description:
I’m sure that the regulars will still hang around here and sit around the campfire talking of the days of old where we all sat here and eagerly waited for this masterpiece to release.

That might be a tad optimistic.

Read full topic
item.source: It's been fun. It will always be.

item.title: It's been fun. It will always be.
item.dc:creator: Old_Mate
item.description:
I know it looks as though I shouldn’t be commenting due to my lack of posts, I’d just like to say that it’s been a good years and I’m glad to have followed this mod for as long as I have (I think it’s been 5 years now). Even after the release of Xen and BM: DM, I’m sure that the regulars will still hang around here and sit around the campfire talking of the days of old where we all sat here and eagerly waited for this masterpiece to release.

I know I will.

Read full topic
item.source: It's been fun. It will always be.

item.description:

for some maybe haha
